title: Gerente de Desenvolvimento de Produto
description:
Job description

A SCForceé o seu time de campo na área de saúde.

Com mais de 25 anos de experiência no setor, terceirizamos a execução e vendas no PDV, consultores de visitação médica e multiplicadores de treinamento em hospitais e clínicas.

Em 2023 passamos a fazer parte do Grupo SC complementando os serviços do grupo e levando mais saúde para mais pessoas.

Todas as nossas vagas estão abertas para pessoas com deficiência (PCD's).


Main responsibilities

  • Responsável por liderar a equipe que planeja, desenvolve e lança produtos ou serviços para garantir que o produto atenda às necessidades dos clientes, alcance as metas de desempenho da empresa e permaneça competitivo no mercado;
  • Responsável por definir a estratégia de produto e o plano de negócios que permitirá que a empresa alcance seus objetivos;
  • Responsável pelo gerenciamento do ciclo de vida do produto, desde a concepção até o lançamento garantindo que o produto esteja de acordo com as expectativas do cliente e cumpra as metas estabelecidas;
  • Responsável pela análise de mercado, sempre atualizado com as tendências do mercado e da indústria, identificando oportunidades e ameaças que possam afetar o desempenho do produto;
  • Coordenação de equipes multifuncionais;
  • Manter uma comunicação clara e eficaz com stakeholders, com todas as partes interessadas, incluindo clientes, gerentes, equipes internas e externas;
  • Responsável por definir metas de desempenho e métricas de sucesso para o produto, garantindo que o produto atinja o sucesso esperado;
  • Tomada de decisão críticas em todas as etapas do ciclo de vida do produto, incluindo decisões sobre design, funcionalidade, recursos, preços e estratégia de marketing;
  • Analisar dados e informações relevantes para tomar decisões informadas sobre o produto.

Requirements and skills

  • Superior completo;
  • Experiência comprovada em liderança;
  • Habilidade para liderar equipes e motivar colaboradores em um ambiente dinâmico;
  • Excelente comunicação e habilidade para trabalhar com diversas áreas da empresa;
  • Capacidade de trabalhar sob pressão e cumprir prazos.

Additional information

  • Horário: De segunda a sexta, das 08h às 18h.
  • Benefícios: VT; VR; Convênio médico, Convênio Odontológico e Seguro de vida.

title: Consultor sap pp pm qm senior projeto nordeste
description:
Detalhes técnicos da Vaga

O Consultor SAP PP/PM/QM será responsável por liderar as atividades dos módulos em projetos e melhorias, implementando processos standard, novas funcionalidades e customizações no módulos SAP PP/PM/QM para atender às necessidades específicas de nossos clientes. Terá a oportunidade de configurar e personalizar o SAP PP/PM/QM, garantindo que ele esteja adequadamente adaptado aos processos e requisitos do negócio.

Responsabilidades e atribuições:

  • Participar de projetos de melhorias e sustentação do módulo de PP.
  • Executar as atividades de projeto de acordo com o planejamento: Desenho/detalhamento de soluções, configurações, testes, documentações, suporte ao cliente;
  • Suportar a preparação e realização dos testes integrados e de regressão aos usuários-chave e analistas de TI, para validação da solução implementada;
  • Elaborar as documentações requeridas pelo projeto: Configurações, testes, desenho/detalhamento de soluções, atas, especificações funcionais, apresentações, entre outros;
  • Treinar os usuários chaves e/ou analistas de TI;
  • Identificar oportunidades e propor soluções e melhorias;

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Tax Manager, International Tax
description:
Amazon is hiring for a Tax Planning Manager, based in São Paulo, to focus on supporting our 3P (marketplace), Payments and Prime business lines in a Tax planning advisory role. The successful candidate will engage and partner with those business teams to support current and future offerings, including expansions, restructurings, operating guidelines, and day-to-day questions while also dealing with a dynamic and changing tax environment being introduced by the BR Tax Reform.


The candidate must be comfortable directly liaising with various business teams within the company, with an aim of gaining a deep understanding of the business vision and model in order to develop clear tax solutions in support of the business, develop tax requirements that clearly articulate such solutions, and drive the implementation of the tax requirements.


Key job responsibilities

The ideal candidate will focus on indirect tax matters but will also have a base knowledge of direct tax and transfer pricing issues and how these can impact the business solution being articulated. The candidate will also work with other members of the global tax department to formulate and drive wider indirect taxes strategy, communicate current and future business plans, obtain cross-functional tax subject matter input, and ensure coordination of cross-functional tax solutions.


A day in the life

This position is not directly involved in day-to-day indirect taxes compliance but is responsible for delivering the advisory planning, real-time coordination, and communication of various tax-related projects across regions, including supporting engagements and negotiations with external advisors, government bodies, tax authorities, and auditors.


BASIC QUALIFICATIONS

  1. Minimum 8 years of relevant tax experience (e.g., Big 4 Accounting Firm, Law Firm or in-house tax experience), or an equivalent combination of education and experience preferred.
  2. Advanced English language

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

  1. Recognized professional tax qualification, chartered accountant or relevant law degree
  2. Detail-oriented individual who takes ownership of projects, is organized, possesses excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, and is able to deliver on tight deadlines
  3. Highly motivated, hard-working, and able to work in a fast-paced, informal, and often ambiguous environment
  4. Able to clearly and concisely interface with all levels of management
  5. Effective interpersonal skills, including persuasive written and oral communication skills

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. #J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Sales Retention Specialist
description:
Are you passionate about helping people, solving problems, and making a difference—all from the comfort of your home? Join us as a Sales Retention Specialist , where you’ll play a vital role in retaining and re-engaging customers by addressing cancellations and resolving concerns with empathy, professionalism, and culturally sensitive communication.

The Role

What You’ll Do

  1. Phone-Based Sales and Service
  • Spend most of your day on the phone, building relationships with current and former customers.
  • Use strong sales and customer service skills to achieve retention and win-back goals.
  1. Customer Retention
  • Handle inbound and outbound Spanish-language calls from customers considering cancellation.
  • Understand the reasons for cancellation and offer personalized solutions to retain their business.
  • Highlight the unique benefits and value of Wave Energy to prevent account closures.
  1. Win-Back Campaigns
  • Proactively call former Spanish-speaking customers to reintroduce Wave Energy services.
  • Present competitive offers and promotions to encourage them to return.
  • Analyze trends in customer cancellations and refine win-back strategies for better results.
  1. Customer Relationship Management
  • Build trust and rapport with customers by demonstrating empathy and a genuine commitment to resolving their concerns.
  • Ensure every interaction is professional, positive, and customer-focused.
  • Provide clear, accurate information about Wave Energy’s services, pricing, and policies.
  1. Performance Metrics
  • Exceed retention and win-back goals by saving accounts and reactivating former customers.
  • Consistently meet daily and monthly quotas while maintaining high customer satisfaction ratings.
  1. Administrative Duties
  • Log all interactions and outcomes in the CRM system accurately and efficiently.
  • Share valuable feedback with management about trends in customer dissatisfaction and cancellations.
  • Collaborate with your team to improve retention and outreach strategies.

Ideal Profile

What You Bring to the Table

  • Fluency in Spanish and English : Exceptional communication skills in both languages (spoken and written).
  • Proven Sales and Customer Service Skills : A track record of achieving sales, retention, or customer service targets.
  • Strong Negotiation Skills : Ability to propose solutions and close deals that satisfy customer needs while benefiting the company.
  • Excellent Listener : A knack for understanding customer concerns and addressing them effectively.
  • Experience Matters : Previous experience in customer service, sales retention, or a similar field.
  • Self-Motivated and Goal-Oriented : Thrives in a fast-paced, results-driven environment.

We’re looking for someone who can start as soon as possible! If you’re ready to take on a meaningful, remote role with an innovative energy company, we want to hear from you.

Help Wave Energy build lasting relationships with its customers—one call at a time.

What's on Offer?

  • Work from Anywhere: Enjoy the flexibility of working from home while making a real difference.
  • Impactful Role: Be at the heart of customer satisfaction, retention, and loyalty.
  • Supportive Environment: Join a collaborative team that values your ideas and contributions.

title: Senior Director – Treasury & Financial Operations (Logistics)
description:
Senior Director – Treasury & Financial Operations (Logistics)

Note: This position is based in Dubai. Candidates will need to relocate, and relocation assistance will be provided.

If shortlisted, we’ll contact you via WhatsApp and email. Please check both and respond promptly.

Job Purpose
This role leads the design, implementation, and management of global cash management structures for the business. Collaborating with the Global Logistics and regional Freight Forwarding teams, this will be achieved through a combination of organic growth and acquisitions. The business will operate with proprietary technology and a global shared service center, serving over 100 branches worldwide and generating over $2bn in revenue.

The role involves developing a treasury strategy to fund working capital needs and manage cross-border fund flows, ensuring cash availability while avoiding overcapitalization that could hinder return on capital employed (ROCE). The strategy will also address foreign exchange risk, financing sources, and provide training and governance support to regional business units.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead the development and management of a global treasury strategy for the freight forwarding business.
  • Establish a cash management structure to manage liquidity across the global network.
  • Implement and improve daily treasury operations.
  • Optimize cash positions to maximize return on capital employed.
  • Provide guidance and training to regional finance managers on managing liquidity and currency finance.
  • Oversee intergroup funding and cash settlements.
  • Ensure funding structures are tax-efficient and compliant with local regulations in all operating regions.
  • Manage bank guarantees and negotiate Asset-Based Lending (ABL) structures (e.g., factoring).
  • Collaborate with the Head Office Treasury on foreign currency and interest rate hedging.
  • Support regional funding processes within the group treasury.
  • Report on cash positions, forecasts, and secure funding for shortfalls.
  • Collaborate with auditors (internal and statutory).

Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree (or equivalent) in Finance & Banking; Master’s degree preferred.

Experience

  • 7 to 10 years of experience in treasury management within the logistics or freight forwarding industry.
  • Banking background and experience with cash pool structures.

Preferred

  • Technical treasury experience (e.g., system implementation).
  • Familiarity with finance modules in ERP systems (e.g., Oracle, SAP).

Skills

  • Strong communication skills to address stakeholder needs and manage change.
  • Problem-solving: Ability to analyze and resolve complex challenges.
  • Detail-oriented with a focus on compliance and company asset protection.
  • Strong collaboration skills, working independently and in diverse teams.
  • Results-driven, proactive in managing competing priorities and meeting deadlines.
  • IT skills: Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and systems management.
  • Flexibility to travel (10-20%) across Europe for on-site tasks.
  • Fluency in English; additional languages (e.g., German, Dutch) are a plus.

Seniority level: Executive

Employment type: Full-time

Job function: Finance and Sales

Industries: Software Development

title: SAP APO Functional Consultant
description:
We are seeking a skilled SAP APO Planning Functional Consultant to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in implementing, configuring, and optimizing SAP APO solutions to meet business requirements related to supply chain planning, demand planning, and production planning. You will collaborate closely with business stakeholders and IT teams to deliver end-to-end SAP APO solutions that drive operational efficiency and business growth.

Please share profile to

The Role

Key Responsibilities :

  • SAP APO Configuration & Implementation :
  • Configure and support SAP APO modules including DP (Demand Planning) , SNP (Supply Network Planning) , PP/DS (Production Planning and Detailed Scheduling) , and GATP (Global Available-to-Promise) .
  • Analyze business processes and translate requirements into SAP APO solutions.
  • Provide expert guidance on best practices for implementing and optimizing planning processes within SAP APO.
  • Business Requirements Gathering :
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and define business requirements for APO-related initiatives.
  • Translate business requirements into technical solutions and configuration specifications.
  • System Design & Testing :
  • Lead the design, development, and testing of SAP APO solutions in alignment with business needs.
  • Support system integration and user acceptance testing (UAT).
  • Provide post-implementation support and troubleshooting for end-users.
  • Optimization and Continuous Improvement :
  • Review and optimize existing APO configurations to enhance system performance, reduce costs, and improve planning accuracy.
  • Identify areas for improvement and recommend solutions to streamline planning processes.
  • Training & Support :
  • Develop and deliver training sessions to end-users on SAP APO functionality and processes.
  • Provide ongoing support for troubleshooting and resolving SAP APO-related issues.
  • Collaboration with Other Modules :
  • Work closely with SAP MM, SD, PP, and WM consultants to ensure smooth integration and end-to-end process optimization.
  • Coordinate with other stakeholders such as IT, business, and external consultants to ensure project success.

Ideal Profile

  • Experience :
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience working with SAP APO, with a focus on planning-related modules (DP, SNP, PP/DS).
  • Proven experience in SAP APO implementations and configuration .
  • Strong understanding of supply chain planning concepts (demand planning, supply planning, inventory management, production planning, etc.).
  • Skills & Expertise :
  • Expertise in SAP APO configuration and integration with SAP ECC
  • Knowledge of forecasting methods , planning strategies , and optimization algorithms .
  • Experience with Global Available-to-Promise (GATP) and integration with other SAP modules (SD, MM, etc.).
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Ability to design, document, and present complex solutions to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Tools & Technologies :
  • Hands-on experience with SAP APO (Demand Planning, Supply Network Planning, PP/DS, GATP).

What's on Offer?

  • Flexible working options
  • Opportunity to make a positive impact
  • A role that offers a breadth of learning opportunities
